summary: Adds a female follower 'Avelyn' or Changes the appearances of Elisif the Fair
descriptionHtml:
[center]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63903-1-1426775673.jpg[/img]

Feature:
-Adds a female follower 'Avelyn' or Changes the appearances of Elisif the Fair
-This is a Standalone mod.

Avelyn's Info:
-Name : Avelyn
-Sex : Female
-Race: Nord
-Body : CBBE (I don't have a plan to upload the UNP version)
-CombatStyle : Mace Warrior
-Location: 'Drunken Huntsman' in Whiterun
-Perk:
Armsman, Bone Breaker, Fighting Stance, Critical Charge, Savage Strike
Shield Wall, Block Runner, Power Bash, Deadly Bash, Disarming Bash, Shield Charge
Juggernaut, Tower of Strength
-Essential, Marriage possible

[youtube]mXqwNExwsXY[/youtube][youtube]K3ztOdDngh8[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4329356]RauxHUN[/url]. Thank you! :D

[youtube]G2uWW6m4hDA[/youtube][youtube]uvqS8WtYuCQ[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/11654708-vatiwah/]vatiwah[/url] and [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19152474]RoleyVideos[/url][/b]. Thank you! :D
